entry.title: Hello, World!
entry.content: Welcome to TaoTaoBao’s Blog Every blog starts with ‘Hello World!’, so do mine. I am TaoTaoBao, the maker of this Blog. My Blog contains my occational thoughts and records some tiny parts of my life (happiness and sorrow). Also, TaoTaoBao’s Blog is the place where I write articles about CFA learning and Fintech. I’d like to study finance and economics in both fundamental and technical ways. I paln to include the prospectus study, which is, I think, the best way to understand the industry. Last but not least, I will blog my English learning details, which I hope can motivate me to learn English better.
